hero.heading: Understanding Your Fundamental Rights
hero.subtitle: Explore the constitutional provisions that protect every citizen of India

articles.title: Right to Equality
articles.description: The State shall not deny to any person equality before the law or the equal protection of the laws within the territory of India.

articles.title: Abolition of Titles
articles.description: No title, not being a military or academic distinction, shall be conferred by the State.

articles.title: Right to Life and Personal Liberty
articles.description: No person shall be deprived of his life or personal liberty except according to procedure established by law.

about.heading: About Us
about.subtitle: Empowering citizens through constitutional awareness and legal education

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are dedicated to making constitutional knowledge accessible to every Indian citizen. Through our Instagram page and this website, we strive to break down complex legal concepts into simple, understandable content that empowers people with knowledge of their fundamental rights.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: Article Jankar began as a social internship project at D.R O.P Bhalla Foundation. What started as an initiative to spread legal awareness has grown into a platform that reaches thousands of people, helping them understand their constitutional rights and responsibilities.

platform.title: Our Platform
platform.description: Follow us on Instagram @articlejankar for daily constitutional insights, infographics, and legal awareness content. Our website serves as a comprehensive resource for in-depth articles and constitutional timeline.

team.title: Meet Our Team

foundation.title: D.R O.P Bhalla Foundation

This foundation provided us with the platform and guidance to transform our passion for legal awareness into a meaningful initiative.
